artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Tsutaya Jūzaburō
catalogue_raissonne: Ukiyo-e shūka 14 (1981), Hiroshige list, p. 246, horizontal ōban #39.5
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
poem(waka)
In evening, sea breeze blowing over the Tama River of Noda in Mutsu. That made plovers cry.
Japanese: Yu_sareba shio-kaze koshite Michinoku no Noda no Tamagawa chidori naku nari
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Six Jewel Rivers in Various Provinces (Shokoku Mu Tamagawa 諸国六玉川)
title: Noda Jewel River in Mutsu Province
